channel.title: User Access Node (UAN)
channel.description: Recent content on User Access Node (UAN)

item.description: Notable Changes The following guide describes changes included in a particular UAN version that may be of note during an install or upgrade. When an upgrade is being performed, please review the notable changes for all of the UAN versions up to the version being installed. If a particular version does not appear in this guide, it may have only had minor changes. For a full account of the changes involved in a release, consult the ChangeLog.

Upgrades Performing an upgrade of UAN from one version to the next follows the same general process as a fresh install. Some considerations may need to be made when merging the existing CFS configuration with the latest CFS configuration provided by the release. The overall workflow for completing a UAN upgrade involves: Perform the UAN Installation Review any Notable Changes Merge UAN CFS Configuration Data Create UAN images and reboot
